Posts.Content: I had a sentinel node biopsy to see if my cancer has spread - but the biopsy has been lost. Has anyone come across this before ?? If so how did you cope ? I am losing the plot. I am going to receive radiotherapy - but am in a bit of a state not knowing the facts. Kimberlina
Posts.Title: Lost sentinel node biopsy

Posts.Content: Well, the surgeon removed the node, but it never got to the path lab - either lost on theatre or on route to lab. Saw onc and I am having a course of radiotherapy - they wanted to do nothing - just "wait and see" - I dont think so, so now I am going to receive the treatment. I have complained to the hospital, but it doesn't make up for the stress and emotions that I have and still am going through. Thank you all for your support. Kimberlina xx
Posts.Title: Lost sentinel node biopsy
